TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BaselineAlignment extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Describes how the baseline for a text-based element is positioned on the vertical axis, relative to the established baseline for text.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Inline.BaselineAlignment%2A> property to align text within a containing box (in this case, a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph>).
[!code-xml[FlowMiscSnippets_snip#BaselineAlignmentExampleWholePage](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/flowmiscsnippets_snip/baselinealignmentexample.xaml#baselinealignmentexamplewholepage)]
The following illustration shows the result of the code above.
![Baseline Alignment](~/add/media/baselinealignment.png "Baseline Alignment")

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.BaselineAlignment Baseline = int32(3)

Docs.summary: A baseline that is aligned at the actual baseline of the containing box.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.BaselineAlignment Bottom = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A baseline that is aligned at the lower edge of the containing box.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.BaselineAlignment Center = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A baseline that is aligned to the center of the containing box.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.BaselineAlignment Subscript = int32(6)

Docs.summary: A baseline that is aligned at the subscript position of the containing box.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.BaselineAlignment Superscript = int32(7)

Docs.summary: A baseline that is aligned at the superscript position of the containing box.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.BaselineAlignment TextBottom = int32(5)

Docs.summary: A baseline that is aligned at the lower edge of the text baseline.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.BaselineAlignment TextTop = int32(4)

Docs.summary: A baseline that is aligned at the upper edge of the text baseline.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.BaselineAlignment Top = int32(0)

Docs.summary: A baseline that is aligned to the upper edge of the containing box.
